name: iStopMotion Animation Clip
summary: Learn about .ISMCLIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: iStopMotion uses the .MOV extension by default rather than the ".ismclip" extension. However, you can use ".ismclip" interchangeably with ".mov," since both are recognized by iStopMotion.

description: Animation clip created by iStopMotion, a program used for making stop sequence animation clips; stores a series of frames that comprise the animation clip; also stores effects, audio, and any other video clip information.
